name: part_016
file: tmp_【#ひろがるホロライブDAY2】hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade holo＊27 stage【チラ見せ】 [pDLDcU3dWp8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_016.mov

scenes.description: MC segment featuring Ookami Mio and Hakui Koyori, concluding their portion of the stage.
Introductory transition to Nakiri Ayame's solo performance.
Nakiri Ayame performs 'GENTSU PI PI PI' on stage.
Transition sequence to the next performance.
Hakos Baelz and Gawr Gura perform 'Sweet Appetite' together.

subtitles.original: それでは我々も戻りますか！
subtitles.english: Shall we head back as well?!

subtitles.original: はい！行きますよ！せーの！
subtitles.english: Yes! Let's go! Ready, set...

subtitles.original: 広がるホロライブ！
subtitles.english: Hirugaru Hololive!

subtitles.original: 落ち込み携帯 どうしたって聞けば",
subtitles.english: Depressed cell phone, whenever I ask what's wrong,

subtitles.original: 「何でもないよ」って言うんだ",
subtitles.english: It says, "It's nothing."

subtitles.original: そっかそっか 気のせいか",
subtitles.english: I see, I see, just my imagination then?

subtitles.original: で、それで引くものか",
subtitles.english: And, like I'd just let it go at that.

subtitles.original: 本当に心配な強気",
subtitles.english: Seriously worried about that bravado.

subtitles.original: 「やり過ぎはだめ」ってなんなら",
subtitles.english: If anything, you say "Don't overdo it."

subtitles.original: 平気 平気 ありがとうね",
subtitles.english: I'm fine, I'm fine, but thanks.

subtitles.original: って、やっぱ普通じゃない",
subtitles.english: But, that's definitely not normal.

subtitles.original: あーまたまたまたまた全然強がんじゃん",
subtitles.english: Ah, there you go again, acting all tough.

subtitles.original: あたいに任せてね",
subtitles.english: Leave it to me!

subtitles.original: 全部いっちゃいな",
subtitles.english: Just let it all out.

subtitles.original: だっていなんか苦しそうじゃん",
subtitles.english: Because you look like you're in pain.

subtitles.original: いっちゃいな",
subtitles.english: Just let it out.

subtitles.original: それもしんどいんだね了解",
subtitles.english: So that's tough too, I get it.

subtitles.original: 笑えるようになるまで",
subtitles.english: Until you can laugh again,

subtitles.original: 隣にいてあげて",
subtitles.english: I'll stay by your side.

subtitles.original: バカな冗談 言い合って",
subtitles.english: Exchanging silly jokes...

subtitles.original: 覚悟しててね",
subtitles.english: Get ready.

subtitles.original: GENTSU PI PI PI
subtitles.english: GENTSU PI PI PI

subtitles.original: GENTSU PI PI PI
subtitles.english: GENTSU PI PI PI

subtitles.original: 君がすり減らぬまで その元気を",
subtitles.english: Until you're no longer worn out, this energy...

subtitles.original: お裾分け 届けたい",
subtitles.english: I want to share it with you.

subtitles.original: いっぱいいっぱい うるさいぐらいに",
subtitles.english: A whole lot, even to the point of being annoying.

subtitles.original: 追い込み携帯 気にしちゃって負けだ",
subtitles.english: Being cornered by your phone, caring too much is a loss.

subtitles.original: 君が倒れちゃったら嫌だ",
subtitles.english: I don't want you to collapse.

subtitles.original: だって だって 不安じゃない",
subtitles.english: Because, because, it's worrying.

subtitles.original: って、これはわがままかな",
subtitles.english: Or is this just me being selfish?

subtitles.original: 痛い 何がしたいだろう",
subtitles.english: Ouch, what am I trying to do?

subtitles.original: 誰のためだろう",
subtitles.english: Who is this for?

subtitles.original: こうやって元気づけたり ブレーキ踏んだり",
subtitles.english: Cheering you up like this, or stepping on the brakes.

subtitles.original: もう馬鹿馬鹿 永遠自己嫌悪",
subtitles.english: So stupid, endless self-loathing.

subtitles.original: 好きだ センチメンタル",
subtitles.english: I love it, this sentimentality.

subtitles.original: 全部いっちゃいな",
subtitles.english: Just let it all out.

subtitles.original: だっていなんか苦しそうじゃん",
subtitles.english: Because you look like you're in pain.

subtitles.original: いっちゃいな",
subtitles.english: Just let it out.

subtitles.original: それもしんどいんだね了解",
subtitles.english: So that's tough too, I get it.

subtitles.original: 君がすり減らすカウンターのスクランブル",
subtitles.english: The scramble of counters you wear down.

subtitles.original: そうだ 好きだなんて",
subtitles.english: That's right, "I love you" or something...

subtitles.original: 絶対言えないよ",
subtitles.english: I could never say that.

subtitles.original: GENTSU PI PI PI
subtitles.english: GENTSU PI PI PI

subtitles.original: GENTSU PI PI PI
subtitles.english: GENTSU PI PI PI

subtitles.original: 君も同じになりなよ 顔上げなよ",
subtitles.english: You should be the same way, look up!

subtitles.original: 染まれ 一切合切 その想いに",
subtitles.english: Let yourself be dyed, through and through, by those feelings.

subtitles.original: やっぱり元気出させちゃう",
subtitles.english: As expected, I'll make you feel better.

subtitles.original: かといって無理は禁物じゃ",
subtitles.english: But even so, overexertion is forbidden.

subtitles.original: 野菜 魚は食べましたかな",
subtitles.english: Did you eat your vegetables and fish?

subtitles.original: どっちどっちどっち",
subtitles.english: Which one, which one, which one?

subtitles.original: ちゃんと断れたい？ 怠慢な",
subtitles.english: Want to refuse properly? How lazy.

subtitles.original: でもちょっと気づいたよ 乙女な",
subtitles.english: But I noticed a bit, your maidenly side.

subtitles.original: 慎重から臆病かな",
subtitles.english: Is it being careful or just cowardly?

subtitles.original: どっちどっちどっち",
subtitles.english: Which one, which one, which one?
